newsitem.title: ESTONIA: ESTONIA - C.BANK APRIL GOLD/FOREIGN RESERVES DOWN.
newsitem.headline: ESTONIA - C.BANK APRIL GOLD/FOREIGN RESERVES DOWN.

text.p: The central bank said on Thursday that its gold and foreign reserves were at 7.89 billion kroons in April, down from 8.1 billion kroons a month ago.
Cash in circulation grew to 5.029 billion kroons in April versus 4.98 billion kroons in March, it added in a statement.
Central bank total assets fell by 0.03 percent in April to 9.29 billion kroons.
The liabilities decreased by 0.9 percent but capital, reserves and profit rose by 4.5 percent in total.
Capital, reserves and profit made up 1.49 billion kroons compared to 1.4 billion kroons in March.
